Title: 1.1 Requirement Gathering & Interviews
Body:
Description:
Conduct interviews with radiologists and sonographers to gather functional requirements.

Acceptance Criteria:
- 10+ user interviews conducted
- Documented feature list in PRD
- Initial MVP defined

Title: 1.2 PRD Drafting
Body:
Description:
Compile requirements into a Product Requirement Document.

Acceptance Criteria:
- PRD includes features, users, constraints, scope
- Reviewed by stakeholders

Title: 2.1 Wireframe Design
Body:
Description:
Design wireframes for desktop and mobile UI.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Wireframes approved
- Interactive prototype ready

Title: 3.1 Kubernetes Cluster Setup
Body:
Description:
Provision a Kubernetes cluster.

Acceptance Criteria:
- kubectl access works
- Nodes healthy

Title: 4.1 Patient Management Microservice
Body:
Description:
Develop backend CRUD service.

Acceptance Criteria:
- CRUD endpoints work
- Tests pass
